ygData.subject: Specialization skill -- NEWS
ygData.msgSnippet: God news for all magic users for all of you wich dont take a look in updated manual this is news about specialization skill also there are some changes
ygData.messageBody:
<html>
God news for all magic users for all of you wich dont take a look in
updated manual this is news about specialization skill also there are
some changes in spells some are removed as all line of " move
item" spells probably as result of recent offers for sell in real $
as we can see at ebay so it at last will not be so easy. Most changes are
for enchanter wich life start to be easier and necromancer. What is most
important is that we finaly start to get some feedback to see what change
and what are plans to change and we can react in base of this. <br>
Write feedback in game on all things wich you wish to see or change,
discuss it on boards or on mail lists so that we can ALL put a presion in
same direction to show our wishes and to have hope to see it hapnd. I
suggest a petition on shadow step spell :)<br>
<br>
<br>
<b>Specialization  New Functionality<br>
<br>
</b>The various Specialization skills will be implemented such that if a
spell is cast in, for example, the abjuration family, the
Specialization  Abjuration skill will be checked (if present) and if
successful, will decrease the amount of mana used to cast the
spell.   The Specialization skills are as follows: 
Specialization  Abjuration, Specialization  Alteration,
Specialization  Conjuration, Specialization  Divination, and
Specialization  Evocation.<br>
<br>
other important spells news<br>
<br>
<br>
<font size=4><b><i>Spells<br>
<br>
</font></b></i><font size=3>Please note that Beta was used for testing
spells.  Some spells did not make the final cut for release. 
This is what Beta was used for  testing the viability of spells and
their impact upon game balance.<br>
<br>
Unless noted below, all spells work with their intended effects. <br>
<br>
<b>Scheduled Changes<br>
<br>
</b>Identify: The identify spell was originally going to reveal the
statistics of an item (Damage, Weight, Weapon Speed, Ac, etc.).  We
decided, however, to leave in the Beta ability of right-clicking an item
for information.  The identify spell will soon be used for revealing
the lore, if any, associated with item.  Lore will only be found on
high magic or Artifact level items  an item with lore will typically
be rare. <br>
<br>
Detect Magic: This spell will be replaced with a new spell sometime in
the near future.  All players who have purchased this spell will
have it automatically updated into their spell books.<br>
<br>
Whirl till you hurl: This spell works as intended and at full
effect.  There is a display error, where a ∩┐╜monster∩┐╜ will not be
seen to spin when the spell is cast on them.   This will be
fixed shortly.<br>
<br>
Illusion: Air Elemental, Water Elemental and Fire Elemental: There is a
display error that causes Enchanters who cast the illusion to look like
Earth Elementals.  This is only a display error  all NPC
reactions are still based on the appropriate elemental type.  This
will be fixed shortly.<br>
<br>
</font><font size=4><b>Changed<br>
<br>
</font></b><font size=3>Dark Pact and Allure of Death  these spells
will no longer change your form in to that of a skeleton.  The
remaining effects work as in Beta.  Higher level versions of this
spell will continue to change your form to that of a skeleton.<br>
<br>
Whirling Wind, Chaotic Feedback, Sanity Warp, Dizzying Wind, Force Shock
and Chaos Flux: These spells are listed in the Strategy guild with the
phrase ∩┐╜Direct Damage and 2 sec stun,∩┐╜ where they should be  listed
to say  ∩┐╜Direct damage and knock the target our of spell
casting.∩┐╜  These spells will disrupt spell casting, forcing the
target to begin casting their spell again. <br>
<br>
</font><font size=4><b>Removed<br>
<br>
</font></b><font size=3>Enchantment of Light<br>
Enchantment of Brilliance<br>
Winged Courier<br>
Umbral Messenger<br>
Detect Magic<br>
<br>
<b>Recent Spell Changes<br>
<br>
</b>Sentinel (Enchanter Spell)  the duration has been
increased.<br>
<br>
Minor Illusion (Enchanter Spell)  a maximum size has been placed on
objects that your illusion will copy.<br>
<br>
Melanie∩┐╜s Mellifluous Motion (Bard)  this song will now effect your
entire party, not just you.<br>
<br>
Divine Barrier (Cleric)  This spell will no longer reverse your
movement commands.<br>
<br>
The range at which a pet will respond to your commands has been
doubled.<br>
<br>
Misty Gate (Druid) has been added to the appropriate Druid Vendor.<br>
<br>
The Clinging Darkness Series (Necromancer) will last longer on
targets.<br>
<br>
Shadow Knights have had two changes made to their spell list.  The
39</font><font size=1><sup>th</font></sup><font size=3> level Banshee
Aura has been changed to Shield Skin, and the
49</font><font size=1><sup>th</font></sup><font size=3> level Boil Blood
has been replaced with Dooming Darkness.<br>
<br>
The recasting time on many Enchanter spells has been reduced.<br>
<br>
Research components  the % frequency of research components found in
the game has been increased by 300%.  <br>
<br>
Vampiric Embrace (Necromancer and Shadow Knight)  Once cast, this
spell gives you a chance of draining HP from your target every time you
attack.  Formally, this spell added to your attack roll.<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
</font>
<BR>
<br>
<div>Silverion</div>
<div>High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)</div>
<br>
<div>
<a href="http://www.tip.it/wizard" EUDORA=AUTOURL>http://www.tip.it/wizard</a></div>
<br>
<div>moderator</div>
<div>
<a href="mailto:_EQ_magic@onelist.com" EUDORA=AUTOURL>mailto:_EQ_magic@onelist.com</a></div>
<br>
</html>
